MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY6 postcode area of Glenrothes. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:00am to carry out emergency repairs to an underground cable fault near Prinlaws Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:55am on Thursday, 29 October 2020
